messages.title: Election Message
messages.content: This election is a two horse race between me and the Tories. Only Labour will protect our NHS from a Tory sell-off, will reinstate TV licences for over-75s and will deliver for WASPI women

mentions.tacticalSituation: This election is a two horse race between me and the Tories.

issues.health: Only Labour will protect our NHS from a Tory sell-off
issues.socialWelfare: will reinstate TV licences for over-75s and will deliver for WASPI women

images.caption: Ruth Jones with Labour Party campaigning material
